snippet: Jose Mourinho understands why Manchester United supporters gave Marouane Fellaini a negative reception during Sunday's 1-0 win over Tottenham Hotspur but the manager will do all he can to protect the midfielder....

lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho understands why Manchester United supporters gave Marouane Fellaini a negative reception during Sunday's 1-0 win over Tottenham Hotspur but the manager will do all he can to protect the midfielder.

snippet: If Chelsea are to salvage anything from their most traumatic season for years then Guus Hiddink will need to preserve his record of never having lost an FA Cup tie when his stuttering team face Everton in the quarter-finals on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Hope Hiddink's FA Cup Record Can Save Season

lead_paragraph: If Chelsea are to salvage anything from their most traumatic season for years then Guus Hiddink will need to preserve his record of never having lost an FA Cup tie when his stuttering team face Everton in the quarter-finals on Saturday.

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini has rejected the notion that the club's announcement that Pep Guardiola will take over at the end of the season has derailed their campaign....

snippet: Sunderland's in-form forward Duncan Watmore will miss the rest of the season after a scan showed he has damaged cruciate knee ligaments, British media reported on Monday....

snippet: Alexis Sanchez has said he is very happy at Arsenal but the Chile winger has put the onus on the north London club to put an end to the protracted contract negotiations to keep him at the Emirates Stadium....

snippet: Everton's 2-1 victory over Manchester City in the first leg of their Capital One Cup (League Cup) semi-final came at a cost with the trio of Romelu Lukaku, Tom Cleverley and Seamus Coleman sustaining injuries during the contest on Wednesday....

headline.main: Injuries Mar Everton's Win Over City
headline.print_headline: Injuries Mar Everton's Win Over City

lead_paragraph: Everton's 2-1 victory over Manchester City in the first leg of their Capital One Cup (League Cup) semi-final came at a cost with the trio of Romelu Lukaku, Tom Cleverley and Seamus Coleman sustaining injuries during the contest on Wednesday.

snippet: Leicester City captain Wes Morgan has signed a new contract designed to keep him at the King Power Stadium until June 2019, the English champions said in a statement on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Leicester Captain Morgan Extends Contract Until 2019

lead_paragraph: Leicester City captain Wes Morgan has signed a new contract designed to keep him at the King Power Stadium until June 2019, the English champions said in a statement on Tuesday.

snippet: Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany is set for yet another spell on the sidelines after sustaining knee ligament damage, his manager Pep Guardiola said on Friday....

headline.main: Kompany Out for Up to Six Weeks as Injury Woes Continue
headline.print_headline: Kompany Out for Up to Six Weeks as Injury Woes Continue

lead_paragraph: Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany is set for yet another spell on the sidelines after sustaining knee ligament damage, his manager Pep Guardiola said on Friday.
